items.text: too full and he lofts this over mid-on. Not fully in control of it, goes off the outside half of the bat
punched down the ground
back of a length outside off and it's almost the ball hitting bat rather than bat hitting ball. He stays still and runs it down to third man
back of a length outside off, cuts it to third man
fuller outside off, pushed to point
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, no run

items.preText: Roger chilling: "Ambris is playing like a cat with nine lives tonight. Should have been out three times already " - maybe it's his day
items.text: too short and he goes back to pull this well through square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, FOUR runs

items.text: back of a length again and he goes to pull again, but doesn't time it as well. Deep midwicket collects
better line, keeps it outside off that time but still back of a length. Punched back to the bowler off the back foot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: shot too full and he comes on the front foot to blast this back over the bowler's head and into the straight boundary
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, FOUR runs

items.text: fuller and straighter, clipped to midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: worked off his pads to fine leg

items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Ambris, 2 leg byes

items.text: full on the pads, clipped to fine-leg
full on off, comes forward and drives straight to mid-off
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

items.text: length on the pads but drifts down the leg side, the keeper collects it near his ankles
full on the pads and this is clipped nicely through midwicket, superbly timed as well, teaser for the fielder all the way to the boundary but beats him eventually
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, FOUR runs
Mustafizur Rahman to Ambris, no run

items.text: length on off, stays back and defends late back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: length on middle, punched off the backfoot down to long-on for one
slower ball on middle, pushed to midwicket, was slightly early into the stroke, pushing in front of his body with the hands
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, no run

items.text: length on middle, awkwardly defended to midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ambris, no run

items.text: length on the pads, clipped past midwicket, but the fielder catches up and keeps them to two
